title: Ep. 248 - Another Horrific Attack On Parental Rights
description:
Today on the show we’ll discuss a story of an innocent family being ripped apart by child protective services. Apparently, you have no rights and no presumption of innocence when the bureaucrats at CPS set their sights on you. Also, President Trump got himself into hot water when he called Robert E. Lee a great general. Well, Robert E. Lee was a great general, and it’s ridiculous that we aren’t allowed to say that anymore. Date: 04-29-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
